Package com.myPack

Class PartOfBoard

java.lang.Object
com.myPack.PartOfBoard
public class PartOfBoard
extends java.lang.Object
This class is one part of the 4 parts of the main board. We keep the status of the part in here and some methods for putting a ball and rotating the part 90' clockwise or converse.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    PartOfBoard​(int partNumber)
    The main constructor of the program.

  • Method Summary

    boolean addBall​(int type, int index)

    A getter method for getting the number of the part.
    int[] getPartStatus()
    A getter method for getting the status of this part In a board.
    java.util.ArrayList<Ball> getPlayerBalls()
    A getter method for getting the status of this part.
    int rotatePart​(int type)
    This method is to rotate the part 90' clockwise or converse.

      A getter method for getting the status of this part.

      A getter method for getting the status of this part In a board.
      Returns:
      the array of status

    • addBall

      public boolean addBall​(int type, int index)
      This method will check if the space for putting the ball in is free and if it was it place it.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the ball
      index - the house of the part
      Returns:
      true or false

    • rotatePart

      public int rotatePart​(int type)
      This method is to rotate the part 90' clockwise or converse. 1 is for clockwise and 2 is for converse.
      Parameters:
      type - 1 or 2
      Returns:
      -1 or 0 or 10 ( for invalid and valid and pass status )
